name: PresentationConnectionCloseEvent
description: The PresentationConnectionCloseEvent interface of the Presentation API is fired on a PresentationConnection when it is closed.

members.name: PresentationConnectionCloseEvent.message
members.description: A human-readable message that provides more information about why the connection was closed.

members.name: PresentationConnectionCloseEvent.reason
members.description: Indicates why the connection was closed. This property takes one of the following values: error, closed, or wentaway.
